name: your zone serena medallion bedding comforter set, purple

reviews.name: your zone serena medallion bedding comforter set, purple
reviews.reviewText: This set is very pretty and a good value for the price, but be aware that the colors look different in person than they appear on the website. Still had the color of my daughter's walls so we kept it. I should also mention that there are many different colors (aqua, turquoise, several shades of pink, coral, navy, and a little lime green. We are very pleased.
reviews.title: We love it but...

reviews.name: your zone serena medallion bedding comforter set, purple
reviews.title: Super cute!

reviews.name: your zone serena medallion bedding comforter set, purple
reviews.reviewText: Bought two of these for my girls shared room. The chevron looks more pink to me in the picture on the walmart website but in person it is more of a pink/purple color but it is very pretty! Good quality construction. We bought the lime green and teal my zone sheet sets in store and mix and matched the sheet sets. We also painted their room with Valspar paint colors (well water for the teal color and a national park gray color). Overall very pleased with this purchase!
reviews.title: Great set at an affordable price!

reviews.name: your zone serena medallion bedding comforter set, purple
reviews.reviewText: My girls love this bedding the teal in it matches perfectly with the paint in their room! The reversible pink side is much darker in person than in the picture but it still is adorable and so warm!
reviews.title: Super cute and warm
